long_description: The general-purpose Seals Sneak 2.5 spray skirt is great for moderate conditions. It helps keep water out while protecting legs from harsh sunlight. Midweight nylon packcloth is coated with polyurethane for water resistance. Strong bungee rim gripping system firmly secures skirt to cockpit coaming. Front webbing grab loop with handle assists with entry and wet exits. Tensioned deck stay creates a convex bend in fabric so water runs off, rather than collecting and pooling on top the skirt. Water-resistant zipper that starts at the waistband and ends at the deck stay makes it easy to put the skirt on quickly. Zipper also makes accessing items in the cockpit possible without having to undo the skirt from the coaming. Removable elastic shoulder straps secure skirt and keep tunnel tensioned; neoprene waist has adjustable rip-and-stick sides for a custom fit. Mesh deck pockets store small essentials for quick access. Double-stitched construction with sealed seams ensures long-lasting wear and water resistance.
short_description: The general-purpose Seals Sneak 2.5 spray skirt is great for moderate conditions. It helps keep water out while protecting legs from harsh sunlight.
